mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION_TB ( RES_CD, RES_EMAIL_ID, RES_NAME, RES_PHONE, RES_NUM_OF_PEO, CHECK_IN_DT, CHECK_OUT_DT, CK_RES_ST, RES_REG_DT, ROOM_NO, MEM_NO ) VALUES ( #{resCd}, #{resEmailId}, #{resName}, #{resPhone}, #{resNumOfPeo}, #{checkInDt}, #{checkOutDt}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, #{roomNo}, #{memNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION_TB SET CK_RES_ST = 'COMPLETED' WHERE RES_CD = #{resCd} AND CK_RES_ST = 'UNPAID'
mapper.select: SELECT ACC.ACCOM_NAME, R.ROOM_NAME, RES.CHECK_IN_DT, RES.CHECK_OUT_DT, R.ROOM_PRICE, RES.RES_CD, RES.MEM_NO FROM RESERVATION_TB RES LEFT JOIN ROOM_TB R ON (RES.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_SQ) LEFT JOIN ACCOMMODATION_TB ACC ON (R.ACCOM_NO = ACC.ACCOM_SQ) WHERE RES.RES_CD = #{resCd}
SELECT RES_NAME, RES_PHONE FROM RESERVATION_TB WHERE RES_CD = #{resCd}
